description: These pita pockets make a perfect lunch or dinner served with sweet potato wedges and salad.
name: Lamb & Feta Meatball Pitas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large tomatoes, skinned, deseeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat one tablespoon of oil in a frying pan on a medium high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute, then add the tomatoes and cook down for 4 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix the lamb mince with the dried herbs, seasoning, lemon zest and the egg, using your hands to ensure it is well combined. Crumble in the feta and mix again. Roll into 20 meatballs.

Heat the remaining oil in a large frying pan on high heat and add the meatballs, cooking for 6-7 minutes, tossing to ensure they are browned on all sides. Pour over the tomato sauce, reduce the heat and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Toast the pitas and slice open, fill each with meatballs and tomato sauce and serve.
